Text:
I've made authorization and it doesn't work. I have such communicate:
"This authorization file is invalid on this computer". What is wrong ??? HELP
How am I supposed to tun the patch file and  click on the patch button when it's just text?
Downloaded again and for some reason the first time it didn't have the patch.exe file. Authorization worked fine. Thanks!
my PC removes the Patch.exe as soon as its finished downloading because it says it is a Trojan, is this an actual Trojan or is my Anti-Virus just been silly?

There's no Trojan, your antivirus just sees the crack as a virus, similar to many other cracks.

Everything works great, thank you uploader.

One question I have though is how can you authorize Max for Live? After following the instructions and installing Max, its just a 30 day demo. Anyone know how to authorize it?

I followed every single step and I keep getting this message "a serious problem has occurred" I have tried different torrents and I still keep getting the same message

Does anyone have a solution for this problem?
